Entries.spring_Mon: I like you, kid.  You set your sights on a goal, and you make it happen.#$b#That's what makes you special.
Entries.spring_Tue: You ask a lot of questions, kid.#$e#You already know everything you need to know about me.
Entries.spring_Wed: I'm glad you're here, kid. I was starting to get bored.
Entries.spring_Thu: Remember, kid, never let your past determine your future.#$b#All that exists is what's right in front of you.
Entries.spring_Fri: I used to be just like you, kid. A fresh soul, full of wide-eyed wonder.#$b#Time changed me; it'll change you, too.
Entries.spring_Sat: Stop by whenever you wanna relax.
Entries.spring_Sun: I'm not done with you yet, kid...*chuckle*#$e#Now, now, patience, you'll know when the time is right.
Entries.summer_Mon: I've been around for a very, very long time. Longer than that wizard; longer than your grandfather. I watched them build Pelican Town from the ground up, watched people come and go. I've seen life begin and end, hearts break and be put back together.#$b#I was here long before you arrived, and I'll be here long after you're gone, kid.
Entries.summer_Tue: The townspeople are all so content in their mediocrity, perfectly happy to stay in one place without ever reaching any further, but you...*chuckle*#$b#An old man gives you a sword, and you don't ask questions; you take it and climb into the monster-infested mines.  You don't hesitate.#$b#A note tells you to put ten beets in the mayor's fridge, and you do, even without knowing what'll come of it. #$b#It's like I've been saying, kid, you're special.
Entries.summer_Wed: I was born an ordinary boy, but I made a decision early in life that I would become extraordinary.
Entries.summer_Thu: Most people don't have legacies that will outlive them, and most people are perfectly happy that way.#$b# Me? I never have been. And I can tell you're not, either.
Entries.summer_Fri: Never stop striving to achieve perfection.#$e#Settle for nothing less than excellence in everything you do.
Entries.summer_Sat: Everyone's got potential, kid, but not everyone has what it takes to reach it.
Entries.summer_Sun: Why don't you stay a while, kid?  Get out of the heat.
Entries.fall_Mon: Keep it up, kid. I think you're gonna be a star.#$e#Just ask me if you need anything.
Entries.fall_Tue: Casinos wouldn't be nearly as lucrative if people understood probability.#$e#You see that man at the slot machine? He's been there for days.#$b#He's convinced the machine will have mercy on him any second now. But of course, it's a machine. Mercy has no meaning to it, only chance.#$b#And mercy won't be enough to save him from the pit he's in.
Entries.fall_Wed: I thought I might see you today.
Entries.fall_Thu: Hey. Don't tell anyone about this place, okay? I want to keep it... exclusive.#$e#You'd keep a secret for your friend Mr. Qi, wouldn't you?
Entries.fall_Fri: You can't keep secrets from me, kid. I hear of every cave bug you cut in two, every gift you give, every crop you grow, every word you speak. $1#$b#You understand, don't you?
Entries.fall_Sat: You're clever, kid, but there's still so much you don't understand.
Entries.winter_Mon: Don't let any one thing be the sum of your ambitions, kid. That's why so many fall to mediocrity.
Entries.winter_Tue: I knew you'd end up here someday. Of course, I had to make it a little difficult so you'd have an incentive to achieve excellence.
Entries.winter_Wed: Why a casino? No reason, just filling a niche.
Entries.winter_Thu: You're a curious one, aren't you?
Entries.winter_Sat: Gambling's a fascinating thing to watch.#$b#So many envy the one who wins big on their first spin.#$b#They don't see the thousands on thousands of gold spent trying to recreate that beginner's luck.
Entries.winter_Sun: One day, kid, all of this will make sense. Until then, just keep climbing.#$e#Just make sure you don't look down. *chuckle*

Entries.QiNutRoom_Mon: There's more to this world than meets the eye, kid. Some day, you might understand.#$b#For now, just keep striving for excellence in everything you do.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Tue: The walnut hunt was both a test of your will and a sort of game.#$b#I must admit, watching you scurry around the island has been very entertaining.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Wed: %Qi is watching the screens, flipping a playing card between his fingers.#$b#*chuckle* {{random:Johnny,Robert,Aiden,Jim}}'ll be wanting this back...
Entries.QiNutRoom_Thu: Your determination is admirable, kid. You really are special.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Fri: Set your eyes on the furthest star, and let that be your goal.#$b#It's always within your power to go one step further than you used to believe.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sat: You like games, don't you, kid?#$b#Why not check out some of my challenges? We can make a game of it.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sun: Between you and me, kid, the casino's more of a side-gig#$b#My real work's out here.

Entries.QiNutRoom_Mon: Y'know, kid, you're the only one who's made it in here.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Tue: I got to where I am through the force of pure willpower, kid.#$b#You see... The mind is a very powerful tool.#$b#In fact, it's the most powerful tool in all of reality... and beyond.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Wed: The screens?#$b#Ah...I like to keep tabs on my friends, that's all.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Thu: Nice and cool in here, isn't it?
Entries.QiNutRoom_Fri: You and I...we're rare, kid.#$b#Most people wouldn't have bothered chasing after ten walnuts, let alone a hundred.#$b#But you? You see a door and want to see what's behind it.#$e#I suppose I shouldn't be surprised, though.#$b#After all, you've never been one to shy away from a challenge.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sat: I'd imagine you're quite popular back home, eh?#$b#Of course you are. The humble farmer that saved the town from the clutches of corporate greed...#$b#And who doesn't love a good zero-to-hero story?
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sun: I see your potential, kid. All I want's for you to keep striving for it.#$b#Sometimes we just need a little nudge. That's where I come in.

Entries.QiNutRoom_Mon: Got some new challenges for you today.#$b#I think you'll like 'em.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Tue: Ah, @, what a pleasant surprise.#$b#...*chuckle* No, it wasn't much of a surprise at all.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Wed: Your grandfather would be proud of you, @.#$b#How do I know?...*chuckle*#$b# I just do, kid.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Thu: You're doing great, kid.#$b#You know where to find me if you ever need help.#$e#Of course, I can't just give you all of the answers. That'd be too easy.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Fri: No one ever became extraordinary without a few sacrifices, kid.#$b#Question is, what are you willing to sacrifice?
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sat: Never lose your drive, kid. Nothing else will get you quite as far as it will.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sun: You've never been afraid to take risks, kid. Risks no one asked you to take.#$b#That's how I know you're special.

Entries.QiNutRoom_Mon: Everything happens for a reason, kid.#$b#You'll understand in time.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Tue: Don't lose sight of the person you want to become.#$b#They'll always be there; you just have to reach for them.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Wed: Power's a simple illusion, kid.#$b#It wouldn't exist if no one believed it did.  Lewis' title would mean nothing if not for the meaning you assign to it.#$b#Once you understand that, you can learn to control the illusion.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Thu: The world's always changing, kid.#$b#Tides rise and fall, the moon waxes and wanes, millenia will see the valley fill...#$b#But I remain constant.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Fri: How's the weather back home, kid?#$b#Nice and warm out here.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sat: Fear's the enemy of excellence, kid.#$b#So many people are so scared of messing up that they never even try.#$b#They'd rather stay where they are now than risk the discomfort of change.
Entries.QiNutRoom_Sun: Don't forget to check the board tomorrow.#$b#You never know what you might find.

Entries.fall_Thu: Hey. Don't tell anyone about this place, okay? I want to keep it... exclusive.#$e#You'd keep a secret for your friend Mx. Qi, wouldn't you?
Entries.summer_Wed: I was born an ordinary child, but I made a decision early in life that I would become extraordinary.

Entries.QiNutRoom_Wed: %Qi is watching the screens, flipping a playing card between their fingers.#$b#*chuckle* {{random:Johnny,Robert,Aiden,Jim}}'ll be wanting this back...

Entries.spring_Mon: It's brave of you to keep coming back here, kid. I like that about you.
Entries.spring_Tue: $y 'You must have so many questions._What's 'it'?_You'll find out soon enough._Why me?_Haven't I told you, kid? You're special._(Remain silent)_Heh. Scared, @?'
Entries.spring_Wed: I've had my sights set on you the moment you stepped off that bus.#$b#Now look at you...*chuckle*.
Entries.spring_Thu: This was always the plan, kid.#$b#You don't know the half of it.
Entries.spring_Fri: By the way, I really am sorry about that whole seal of silence business.#$b#I just couldn't take any chances, and I know how you like to talk.#$b#You understand, right? #$e#*chuckle* Of course you do.
Entries.spring_Sun: I know that look in your eyes.#$b#You've got a fire, kid, you always have.
Entries.summer_Mon: One day, kid, when you're sitting on the top of the world, all of this will make sense.
Entries.summer_Tue: Well, well, well. Look who's back.
Entries.summer_Wed: What about you, kid? Will you become extraordinary?
Entries.summer_Fri: I've got big plans for you, kid.#$b#I'm looking forward to seeing it all play out.
Entries.summer_Sun: You're clever, kid. Maybe too clever for your own good.
Entries.fall_Mon: Who am I?#$b#*chuckle* Who I am doesn't matter. What matters is who you'll become.
Entries.fall_Tue: You've made it this far, kid. How much further can you go?
Entries.fall_Wed: There comes a point in everyone's life when they find themselves on the precipice of excellence.#$b#Most people never take that jump. They remain in their mediocrity. But not you.#$b#That's what I've been waiting for, kid: someone like you.
Entries.fall_Thu: I'm putting a lot of faith in you, kid. Don't disappoint me.
Entries.fall_Fri: Remember what I said, eh? Don't go telling people about this place.#$b#I'm still your friend Mr. Qi, aren't I?
Entries.fall_Sat: It must be so frustrating, kid...#$b#To have all these questions with no way to ask them.#$b#I can see it in your eyes.
Entries.fall_Sun: I'm a man of my word, kid. Never forget that.
Entries.winter_Mon: One day, kid, you'll find yourself with the world in the palm of your hand.#$b#Then you might begin to understand who I am.
Entries.winter_Tue: Let me let you in on a secret.#$b#There's no innate gift that determines whether or not one will achieve excellence.#$b#Just a choice and the will to make it.
Entries.winter_Wed: You never cease to impress me, kid. Reaching the bottom of the mines is one thing. Making it across the crimson badlands is another feat entirely.#$b#I knew you had it in you, though.
Entries.winter_Thu: Nothing escapes me, kid.  Don't forget that.
Entries.winter_Sat: Watch yourself out there, kid. You never know what's waiting for you.
Entries.winter_Sun: You're a fighter, kid. Keep it up.

Entries.fall_Fri: Remember what I said, eh? Don't go telling people about this place.#$b#I'm still your friend Mr. Qi, aren't I?
Entries.fall_Sun: I always keep my word, kid. Never forget that.
